properties.name: topics
properties.value: {{\"A comma-separated list of up to 3 topics or subject areas (not more than 4 words for each topic) that are covered in the article. Topics should use title case.\"|split:\", \"|wikilink|join}}

properties.name: tags
properties.value: {{\"A comma-separated list of up to four short snake-case tags or labels that capture the essence of the article to be used in note-taking apps like Obsidian.\"|split:\", \"|join}}
